channel.title: Make king less likely to be evil
channel.description:
make it the same as normal people with about 60% chance of good,20% chance neutral and 20% chance evil.
New, meta players are execute happy and are more than willing to take current odds. I know allies is being drastically nerfed (and am thankful for this but people will still rely on king hard
